com.googlecode.aluminumproject.serialisers.xml
Class XmlSerialiser

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.serialisers.xml.XmlSerialiser
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationElement, Serialiser
public class XmlSerialiser
extends Object
implements Serialiser

Serialises templates as XML documents.

The serialisation is delegated to template element serialisers; for each template element type, a different template element serialiser is used. The XML serialiser uses the following template element serialisers:

  • An action element serialiser for action elements;
  • A text element serialiser for text elements;
  • An expression element serialiser for expression elements.
Subclasses that want to support more template element types or would like to use different template element serialisers can override the addTemplateElementSerialisers method or add a template element serialiser from the initialise method.

To support a custom naming strategy in templates, the XML serialiser allows an element name translator to be configured (using the "serialiser.xml.element_name_translator.class" configuration property). If no element name translator is configured, the default element name translator will be used.

findTemplateElementSerialiser

protected <E extends TemplateElement> TemplateElementSerialiser<? super E> findTemplateElementSerialiser(Class<E> templateElementType)
Finds a template element serialiser for a certain template element type. This implementation checks all added template element serialisers and returns the first one that can serialise template elements with either the requested type or one of its supertypes.

Type Parameters:
E - the type of the returned template element serialiser
Parameters:
templateElementType - the type of the template element to find a template element serialiser for
Returns:
a template element serialiser for the given template element type or null when no template element serialiser was added that can serialise template elements with the requested type
